channel.title: CVE Feed for B&R -- Automation Studio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for B&R -- Automation Studio

item.title: CVE-2019-19102|2024-08-05T02:09:39.123Z -- b%26r -- automation%20studio
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability in SharpZipLib used in the upgrade service in B&R Automation Studio versions 4.0.x, 4.1.x and 4.2.x allow unauthenticated users to write to certain local directories. The vulnerability is also known as zip slip.

item.title: CVE-2019-19101|2024-08-05T02:09:39.436Z -- b%26r -- automation%20studio
item.description: A missing secure communication definition and an incomplete TLS validation in the upgrade service in B&R Automation Studio versions 4.0.x, 4.1.x, 4.2.x, < 4.3.11SP, < 4.4.9SP, < 4.5.5SP, < 4.6.4 and < 4.7.2 enable unauthenticated users to perform MITM attacks via the B&R upgrade server.

item.title: CVE-2019-19100|2024-08-05T02:09:39.275Z -- b%26r -- automation%20studio
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability in the upgrade service in B&R Automation Studio versions 4.0.x, 4.1.x, 4.2.x, < 4.3.11SP, < 4.4.9SP, < 4.5.4SP, <. 4.6.3SP, < 4.7.2 and < 4.8.1 allow authenticated users to delete arbitrary files via an exposed interface.
